title: Mike Herrera from MXPX
itunes:title: Mike Herrera from MXPX
description:
Episode 274 - A fellow podcast buddy is on the show this week, oh and he also plays for one of the most notable punk bands around in the form of MXPX, Mike Herrera. We get into the weeds with podcasting, spirituality and the dogma attached to it. Really fun stuff that I am happy we were able to hit on. I HIGHLY suggest you listen to this week, whether you are a fan of MXPX or not. Jump in! Use the code WORDS for 50% off an incredible smile with Smile Direct Club!Get $30 off your first delivery of incredible food from Hello Fresh by using the code WORDS30 at checkout. Eat and be merry!Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy. Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
